```{r, message = F, warning = F}
require(tidyverse)
require(Seurat)
#require(CellID)
#require(SingleR)
require(stImage)
require(patchwork)
require(Cairo)
require(reticulate)
use_condaenv("myenv")
#install_tensorflow()
require(tensorflow)
require(keras)

new_tstamp <- "20220819"
tstamp <- "20220527"
#source("/data/cqs/ywang/Zhao_image/stImage/SpatialTranscriptomicsImage/stImage/ImageFeature_rawImage.R")
#source("/data/cqs/ywang/Zhao_image/stImage/SpatialTranscriptomicsImage/stImage/LoadImageFeature.R")
#source("/data/cqs/ywang/Zhao_image/stImage/SpatialTranscriptomicsImage/stImage/MultimodalImageWorkflow.R")


```

```{r}
pre_path = "/data/cqs/ywang/Zhao_image/stImage"
proj_folder = "Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb"
workDir = paste(pre_path, "SpatialTranscriptomicsImage", "stImage", sep = "/")
h5_file = "Visium_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5"
setwd(workDir)

data_path=paste(pre_path, proj_folder, sep = "/") #need filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5 file and spatial folder
spatial_path = paste(data_path, "spatial", sep = "/")

imgFile=paste(spatial_path, "tissue_hires_image.png", sep = "/")
rawimg=paste(data_path, "Visium_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_image.tif", sep = "/")

#positionTableFile is 10X format, Columns: Tissue; Y,X,ImageY,ImageX
positionTableFile=paste(spatial_path, "tissue_positions_list.csv", sep = "/")

patchSize=200

```

# load our MOB object (raw image version)

```{r}
#Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_rawimage_obj <- readRDS("Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_rawimage_object.rds")
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_rawimage_obj <- readRDS(paste0(proj_folder, "_rawimage_object", tstamp, ".rds"))

```

# run analysis with stLearn and Yuankai's imagefeature data


```{r, eval=FALSE}
imageFeatures_stLearn <- read.csv(paste0(workDir,"/Yuankai/mob_imagefeature_stLearn.csv"), row.names=1)
imageFeaturePCs_stLearn <- read.csv(paste0(workDir,"/Yuankai/mob_imagefeaturePCs_stLearn.csv"), row.names=1)
imageFeaturePCs_stLearn <- as.matrix(imageFeaturePCs_stLearn)
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj <- LoadImageFeatureVisium(data_path, filename = h5_file,
                                  imageFeatures = imageFeatures_stLearn)

imageFeatures_Yuankai <- read.csv(paste0(workDir,"/Yuankai/mob_imagefeature_Yuankai_fix.csv"), row.names=1)

imageFeatures_Yuankai[is.na(imageFeatures_Yuankai)] <- 0

Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_obj <- LoadImageFeatureVisium(data_path, filename = h5_file,
                                  imageFeatures = imageFeatures_Yuankai)

imageFeatures_MUSE <- read.csv(paste0(workDir,"/Yuankai/mob_imagefeature_MUSE_fix.csv"), row.names=1)
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj <- LoadImageFeatureVisium(data_path, filename = h5_file,
                                  imageFeatures = imageFeatures_MUSE)
##resnet50 Yuankai's version
imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50 <- read.csv(paste0(workDir,"/Yuankai/20220805/clustering_data_Resnet50/0_feature_resnet50.csv"), row.names=1)
imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50 <- imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50[,-(1:3)]
colnames(imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50) <- paste0("ImageFeature", as.numeric(gsub("X(\\d+)$", "\\1", colnames(imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50))) + 1)
imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50 <- imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50[order(rownames(imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50)),]
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj <- LoadImageFeatureVisium(data_path, filename = h5_file,
                                  imageFeatures = imageFeatures_Yuankai_resnet50)

##vgg16 Yuankai's version
imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16 <- read.csv(paste0(workDir,"/Yuankai/20220805/clustering_data_vgg16/0_feature_vgg16.csv"), row.names=1)
imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16 <- imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16[,-(1:3)]
colnames(imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16) <- paste0("ImageFeature", as.numeric(gsub("X(\\d+)$", "\\1", colnames(imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16))) + 1)
imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16 <- imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16[order(rownames(imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16)),]
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_vgg16_obj <- LoadImageFeatureVisium(data_path, filename = h5_file,
                                  imageFeatures = imageFeatures_Yuankai_vgg16)

```

## Data preprocessing of Spatial matrix and ImageFeature matrix

```{r, eval = F}
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearnPC_obj <- CreateDimReducObject(embeddings = imageFeaturePCs_stLearn, key = "iPC_", assay = "ImageFeature")
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj <- MultimodalPreProcess(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", ImageFeaturePCobj = Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearnPC_obj, pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, geneResolution=1.05, imageFeatureResolution=2.23)
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_stLearn_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))
#Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj <- readRDS(paste0(proj_folder, "_stLearn_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_obj <- MultimodalPreProcess(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, geneResolution=1.05, imageFeatureResolution=2.23)
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))
#Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_obj <- readRDS(paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj <- MultimodalPreProcess(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, geneResolution=1.05, imageFeatureResolution=2.23)
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_MUSE_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))


Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj <- MultimodalPreProcess(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, geneResolution=1.05, imageFeatureResolution=2.23)
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_resnet50_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))
#Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj <- readRDS(paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_resnet50_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))


Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_vgg16_obj <- MultimodalPreProcess(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_vgg16_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, geneResolution=1.05, imageFeatureResolution=2.23)
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_vgg16_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_vgg16_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))
#Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_vgg16_obj <- readRDS(paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_vgg16_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

```

## Data analysis of Spatial matrix and ImageFeature matrix

```{r, eval = F}
Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj <- MultiModalIntegrationVisium(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, imageAndGeneResolution=1.2, MultimodalMethod = c("WNN"))
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_stLearn_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj <- MultiModalIntegrationVisium(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, imageAndGeneResolution=1.2, MultimodalMethod = c("WNN"))
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_MUSE_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_MUSE_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))


Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj <- MultiModalIntegrationVisium(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj, normalizeMethod = "SCT", pcaDim_s=30, pcaDim_i=30, imageAndGeneResolution=1.2, MultimodalMethod = c("WNN"))
#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_resnet50_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_resnet50_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

#DoHeatmap(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_stLearn_obj, assay="ImageFeature")
saveRDS(Adult_Mouse_Olfactory_Bulb_Yuankai_vgg16_obj, paste0(proj_folder, "_Yuankai_vgg16_object", new_tstamp, ".rds"))

```
